long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch Netflix, Youtube, Disney Plus, Laftel and more in sync with friends

Discover Gatch, the ultimate browser extension for watching TV and movies in sync with friends, no matter where you are. With Gatch, you can sync your favorite Netflix, Disney Plus, YouTube, and Laftel shows for real-time shared viewing experiences. 

Itâ€™s perfect for long-distance movie nights, adding synchronized playback and group chat to your favorite streaming sites.

Join over  whole users who enjoy enhanced viewing with friends using Gatch. Now in version 1.0.0 Gatch offers free support for popular services including Netflix and Laftel.

Looking for something like Netflix Party? Gatch is your answer. Set up your virtual watch party today and see why everything is better when watched together!
